name: Cusano - CC Bundle - 606
additionalNotes: This unique Cusano bundle offers a quality 20-pack of medium-to-full-bodied smokes steeped in the Cuban tradition and handmade with Dominican flavors wrapped in a savory, Ecuadorian sun-grown leaf. Inside, the Cusano CC boasts premium-grade, aged filler tobaccos from the Dominican Republic that also add a little spice. The extraordinary binder and filler combination complements the robust, Ecuadorian sun-grown wrapper immensely well.
